column1: Kata Robata////The happy hour menu (we got there just a little before 5pm when happy hour ends on Sunday) allowed us to try the crunchy eel roll
column2: a chicken-skewer dish whose name escapes me
column3: and the tuna tar-tar.  After my girlfriend had one piece of the crunchy eel roll she immediately ordered another roll - they were that good!  The chicken skewer was really well done
column4: juicy chicken.  That may not seem that great
column5: but at $1 for 3 pieces on a skewer
column6: its worth trying.  The tuna tar-tar was heavenly to me
column7: the rest of the group settled on the crunchy eel roll as the best appetizer
